meanings.definition: Relating to or based on numerology.
meanings.sent1: The numerological chart helped me understand my personality traits.
meanings.sent2: She consulted a numerological expert to analyze her birth date.
meanings.sent3: The numerological predictions were surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent4: His numerological approach to decision-making was unique.
meanings.sent5: The numerological analysis revealed hidden patterns in the data.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the study of the occult significance of numbers.
meanings.sent1: The numerological symbols held mystical meanings for the ancient civilization.
meanings.sent2: Many ancient cultures believed in the power of numerological interpretations.
meanings.sent3: The numerological rituals were performed under the full moon.
meanings.sent4: She delved into the numerological mysteries of the ancient texts.
meanings.sent5: The numerological secrets were passed down through generations.
